Lenovo Folio Case For Lenovo M10 Gen3 Tablet

The Lenovo Folio Case is a stylish and durable case that can protect your Lenovo M10 Gen3 Tablet from scratches, bumps, and dust. This case is made of a modern material that has a comfortable texture and a brimless design that fits your tablet perfectly. The Lenovo Folio Case also has a magnetic closure that keeps your tablet secure and a cutout for the camera that lets you take photos and videos without removing the case. The Lenovo Folio Case also has a dual stand mode feature that allows you to enjoy your tablet from different angles and positions. You can fold the case into a stand mode that props up your tablet for easy viewing of videos, photos, and web pages. You can also fold the case into a tilt mode that elevates your tablet for comfortable typing, drawing, and gaming. The case also has a smart wake and sleep function that automatically turns on and off your tablet when you open and close the case.

full_description:
Lenovo Tab M8 Gen 4 3GB RAM 32GB Storage 8" HD Tablet

The Lenovo Tab M8 Gen 4 tablet has an 8-inch display, outstanding performance, and a long battery life. The tablet features an 8-inch HD (1280x800) IPS display with a clean and wide viewing angle. The tablet also includes a Mediatek Helio A22 processor, a 2.3 GHz octa-core microprocessor capable of multitasking and gaming. The tablet also includes 3GB of LPDDR4x RAM and 32GB of eMMC 5.1 storage for programs and files. The tablet also has a 5100mAh battery that can run for up to 12 hours. The tablet also supports 10W fast charging, allowing it to be charged quickly and easily. You may use the Lenovo Tab M8 Gen 4 for a whole day without needing to charge it. This tablet is ideal for family road trips because it has an all-day battery for streaming. The Lenovo Tab M8 Gen 4 tablet has been TÜV-certified for eye care. It safeguards delicate eyes by lowering blue light emissions. Turn on Reading Mode to enjoy a more realistic and immersive reading experience that allows you to read for longer periods of time. Protect yourself and your family by using a privacy dashboard that allows you to manage your privacy permissions. For added peace of mind, an indicator on the camera and microphone lets you know when they're turned on.

Convenient Entertainment

The Lenovo Tab M8 Gen 4 tablet has a compact and narrow body and a lightweight design that makes it ideal for on-the-go browsing, gaming in bed, and watching movies at home. The 8-inch HD display is also the ideal size for your children to learn and play.

Helps Kids Discover with Google Kids Space

The Google Kids area on the Lenovo Tab M8 Gen 4 tablet helps children discover, create, and grow by providing a library of excellent material and recommendations for kids to explore their latest fascinations in fresh and interesting ways. With parent controls in Google's Family Link app, you can govern your child's experience by limiting content, setting screen time limits, and more from your own device.

Lenovo Tab M9 MediaTek Helio G80 3GB RAM 32GB Storage 9" HD Tablet

The Lenovo Tab M9 Tablet has a long battery life, a good display, and good performance. The 9-inch HD (1340x800) IPS display on the Lenovo tablet offers a sharp and expansive field of vision. The Mediatek Helio G80 CPU, a 12 nm octa-core chip that supports gaming and multitasking, is also included in the Tab M9 tablet. Your programs and files can be stored on the tablet's 32GB of eMMC 5.1 storage and 3GB of LPDDR4x RAM. A Li-Polymer 5100mAh battery that can power the tablet for up to 10 hours is also included. Additionally, the Lenovo Tab M9 tablet has a 3.5 mm audio connector, Bluetooth, GPS, and Wi-Fi. Both the 8 MP rear and 2 MP front cameras of the Lenovo Tab M9 Tablet are capable of taking still images and videos. The most recent operating version of Android 12 is also available for use on the tablet. A tablet that combines performance, battery life, and display is the Lenovo Tab M9.

A Thin and Light Stylish Design

The Lenovo Tab M9 tablet will enhance your sense of style with its dual-tone Arctic Grey and Frost Blue options. This device is ideal for use on-the-go, wherever life takes you, because of its thin and compact design.

Immersive Cinematic View

With the Lenovo Tab M9, stream your favorite series and films for an incredibly portable cinematic experience. You'll receive an immersive experience thanks to the excellent HD display and twin stereo speakers boosted by Dolby Atmos.

Power in Your Hand

Play your favorite games on the Lenovo Tab M9 tablet while you take a break. With an octa-core MediaTek Helio G80 processor and an ample amount of storage, gaming and surfing are effortless and enjoyable.

Reading Mode

With its Immersive Reading Mode, which enhances your reading experience with ambient sounds, the Lenovo Tab M9 tablet lets you select the atmosphere. Additionally, your eyes can unwind thanks to the displays' TÜV eye care certification.

Keep Secure with Face Lock

The quick and secure facial recognition log-in, among other increased security features, ensures that anything you keep on your Lenovo Tab M9 is protected. Additionally, you can guarantee that your tablet will remain safe in the future with three years of security updates.

Longer Battery Life

Enjoy longer periods of time to binge, unwind, and rest thanks to the Lenovo Tab M9 tablet's extended battery life. And carry around a collection of your preferred movies and TV series in your pocket thanks to the extendable microSD card storage.

title: Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) Snapdragon 4GB RAM 128GB ROM 10.61" 2K Android Tablet
cat_seo_title: Lenovo Tablet Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Lenovo Tablet at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest Lenovo Tab available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) Snapdragon 4GB RAM 128GB ROM 10.61" 2K Android Tablet

The Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) is a versatile and portable Android tablet that offers great entertainment and productivity features, making it a perfect fit for students as well. With an octa-core Snapdragon processor and 4GB of RAM, this tablet offers smooth and snappy performance that can handle everyday tasks with ease. The tablet comes with 128GB of storage, which can be expanded via a microSD card, providing ample space for storing files, photos, and videos. The device features a 10.61" 2K IPS display that offers a stunning viewing experience, delivering crisp and clear visuals with a resolution of 2560 x 1600 pixels. With its mobile maximum 1080p streaming capability, you can watch your favorite movies and TV shows in high-definition quality. The immersive quad-speaker system optimized with Dolby Atmos delivers a powerful and immersive audio experience that brings your favorite movies and music to life. The tablet also features a long-lasting battery that can provide all-day performance, allowing you to work, study, and entertain yourself without having to worry about charging the device frequently.

Cinematic streaming & entertainment

There's nothing like the dazzling, 10.6" 2K IPS display on the Tab M10 Plus Gen 3. Stream your Netflix, Disney+, and other services at up to 1080p, the maximum video resolution available for mobile devices. Plus, with TÜV Low Blue Light certification, you can enjoy long, comfortable hours of screen time—all while the quad-speaker system envelops you with sound.

Study smarter, not harder

A lightweight, portable tablet like the Tab M10 Plus Gen 3 is great for student research and projects. It works with the Lenovo Instant Memo app to make on-screen input a breeze, from hand-written notes and sketches to marking up documents to dragging and dropping text.

Keep focused with Reading Mode

Immersive Reading Mode makes long screen sessions easier on the eyes. It enhances readability by simulating the color matrix of the pages in a printed book, so it's more like reading on paper. Use a muted chromatic setting or switch to mono/grayscale to stay focused with less eye strain, whether you're reading an e-book, editing a long document, or whatever.

Stay up to date

The Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) 10.61" Tablet ships with Android 12. You'll get all the latest Android 12 features and enjoy three years of security and other updates with an even newer version, Android 13, expected in 2023.

Processing power & long battery life

Stream, study, and multitask for hours, even unplugged. With a choice of quality, octa-core processors, the Tab M10 Plus Gen 3 tablet has the power to spare. And with a battery that can run the whole day, you can use it just about anywhere.

Make a statement without saying a word

The Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) 10.61" 4GB RAM 128GB Tablet is bold-looking and contemporary, as stylish as it is technologically advanced. It's very thin 7.45mm / 0.29" and starts at just 465g / 1.03 lbs, thanks to an aluminum chassis that's both lightweight and durable. And with two dual-tone color options to choose from, Storm Grey and Frost Blue, it stands apart from other tablets in its class.

Buy Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) Snapdragon 4GB RAM 128GB ROM 10.61" 2K Android Tablet from Star Tech

We have a large collection of the latest Lenovo Tablets to purchase. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at the lowest price. The Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) 10.61" 4GB RAM 128GB Tablet comes with a 1-year warranty.

full_description:
Lenovo Tab M10 (3rd Gen) 4GB RAM 64GB Storage 10.1-Inch FHD Tablet LTE (Sim Supported) with Folio Case

The Lenovo Tab M10 Gen 3 Tablet, powered by the UNISOC T610 octa-core processor, offers fast and responsive performance for various applications. Whether you are browsing the web, watching videos, playing games, or working on your tasks, the 10.1-inch FHD IPS display, which has a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels and a brightness of 320 nits, offers you a clear and vivid picture quality, as well as a wide viewing angle and a low blue light mode. The Lenovo Tab M10 Gen 3 also runs on the Android 11 operating system, which can provide you with a range of features and functions to enhance your productivity and entertainment. The Lenovo tablet also has a memory of 4GB LPDDR4X and a storage of up to 64GB (eMCP), which can be expanded with a microSD card reader. These components can allow you to multitask and store your files and apps with ease. The Lenovo Tab M10 (3rd Gen) Tablet also has dual speakers with Dolby Atmos technology, which can provide you with rich and immersive audio. In the camera segment, the Lenovo Tab M10 (3rd Gen) has an 8MP autofocus rear camera and a 5MP fixed focus front camera, which can enable you to take photos and videos, as well as make video calls. The Tab M10 Gen 3 also features a range of connectivity options, such as WiFi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 5.0, WiFi Direct, WiFi Display, GLONASS, A-GPS (LTE models only), USB-C 2.0, headphone/mic combo, and nano SIM slot (LTE models only). These ports and connectors can allow you to connect the tablet to various devices and accessories, such as headphones, keyboards, mice, monitors, etc. The Lenovo tablet also supports a face unlock feature, which can provide you with more security and convenience.

Fun & Healthy with Google Kids Space

One of the features of the Lenovo Tab M10 Gen 3 10.1-Inch FHD Tablet is that it comes with Fun & Healthy with Google Kids Space, which is a mode that can provide your kids with a safe and engaging environment to explore their interests and learn new skills. Google Kids Space is a platform that offers a variety of videos that are suitable and fun for children of different ages and preferences. YouTube Kids also has parental controls, which allow you to customize the content and settings for your kids, such as limiting the watch time, blocking certain channels, or creating profiles for each child. YouTube Kids also has a kid-friendly interface, which makes it easy for your kids to navigate and discover new videos.

Latest Android OS

The latest Android 11 OS with the Lenovo Tab M10 Gen 3 Tablet offers a range of features and functions to enhance your productivity and entertainment. Android 11 OS features a smart notification panel, you can also prioritize your conversations and access them from different apps. A power menu that can give you quick access to your smart home devices, such as lights, cameras, thermostats, etc. You can also use Google Pay and Google Assistant from the power menu. The Lenovo Tab M10 Gen 3 Tablet also has a promise of three years of security and other updates—and Android 12 starting in Fall 2022. This means you can enjoy the latest features and functions of Android OS, as well as keep your tablet protected from malware and viruses.

Dolby Atmos Audio

The Lenovo Tab M10 Gen 3 Tablet features dual speakers featuring immersive Dolby Atmos audio technology. This technology can provide you with superior sound quality as well as a surround sound effect. Dolby Atmos audio is a technology that can create a three-dimensional sound field, which can make you feel like you are in the middle of the action. The dual speakers can also deliver a loud and clear sound, which can enhance your enjoyment of your favorite content.

Long Screen Time with Less Eye Strain

Another feature of the Lenovo Tab M10 Gen 3 Tablet is that it is TÜV Rheinland Low Blue Light-certified, which means it emits greatly reduced levels of harmful blue light that can strain your eyes. Blue light is a type of light that has a short wavelength and high energy, and it can cause eye fatigue, dryness, blurred vision, headaches, and sleep problems. The Tab M10 Gen 3 has a low blue light mode, which can filter out the blue light and adjust the color temperature and brightness of the display.

full_description:
Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) Snapdragon 6GB RAM 128GB ROM 10.61" 2K Android Tablet

The Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) is a versatile and portable Android tablet that offers great entertainment and productivity features, making it a perfect fit for students as well. With an octa-core Snapdragon processor and 6GB of RAM, this tablet offers smooth and snappy performance that can handle everyday tasks with ease. The tablet comes with 128GB of storage, which can be expanded via a microSD card, providing ample space for storing files, photos, and videos. The device features a 10.61" 2K IPS display that offers a stunning viewing experience, delivering crisp and clear visuals with a resolution of 2560 x 1600 pixels. With its mobile maximum 1080p streaming capability, you can watch your favorite movies and TV shows in high-definition quality. The immersive quad-speaker system optimized with Dolby Atmos delivers a powerful and immersive audio experience that brings your favorite movies and music to life. The tablet also features a long-lasting battery that can provide all-day performance, allowing you to work, study, and entertain yourself without having to worry about charging the device frequently.

Cinematic streaming & entertainment

There's nothing like the dazzling, 10.6" 2K IPS display on the Tab M10 Plus Gen 3. Stream your Netflix, Disney+, and other services at up to 1080p, the maximum video resolution available for mobile devices. Plus, with TÜV Low Blue Light certification, you can enjoy long, comfortable hours of screen time—all while the quad-speaker system envelops you with sound.

Study smarter, not harder

A lightweight, portable tablet like the Tab M10 Plus Gen 3 is great for student research and projects. It works with the Lenovo Instant Memo app to make on-screen input a breeze, from hand-written notes and sketches to marking up documents to dragging and dropping text.

Keep focused with Reading Mode

Immersive Reading Mode makes long screen sessions easier on the eyes. It enhances readability by simulating the color matrix of the pages in a printed book, so it's more like reading on paper. Use a muted chromatic setting or switch to mono/grayscale to stay focused with less eye strain, whether you're reading an e-book, editing a long document, or whatever.

Stay up to date

The Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) 10.61" Tablet ships with Android 12. You'll get all the latest Android 12 features and enjoy three years of security and other updates with an even newer version, Android 13, expected in 2023.

Processing power & long battery life

Stream, study, and multitask for hours, even unplugged. With a choice of quality, octa-core processors, the Tab M10 Plus Gen 3 tablet has the power to spare. And with a battery that can run the whole day, you can use it just about anywhere.

Make a statement without saying a word

The Lenovo Tab M10 Plus (3rd Gen) 10.61" 6GB RAM 128GB Tablet is bold-looking and contemporary, as stylish as it is technologically advanced. It's very thin 7.45mm / 0.29" and starts at just 465g / 1.03 lbs, thanks to an aluminum chassis that's both lightweight and durable. And with two dual-tone color options to choose from, Storm Grey and Frost Blue, it stands apart from other tablets in its class.

full_description:
Lenovo K10 Pro Snapdragon 680 6GB RAM 128GB ROM LTE (Nano-SIM) 10.6" Android Tablet

The Lenovo K10 Pro is a multifunctional Android tablet with a stylish design and strong performance. This tablet's 6GB of RAM and Qualcomm Snapdragon 680 chipset allow for seamless multitasking and effective functioning. With 128GB of ROM that can be expanded to 2TB with a TF card, it provides plenty of storage for large media libraries and applications. The 10.6-inch LCD on the Lenovo tablet has a resolution of 2000 x 1200 pixels, providing sharp and colorful images. It has a UI that is both contemporary and easy to use, running on Android 12. The extensive connectivity choices include dual-band WLAN (2.4G/5GHz 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac), Bluetooth 5.0, and LTE support via Nano-SIM, which guarantee easy internet access and device pairing. The Lenovo K10 Pro Tablet's camera equipment consists of a 13MP back camera with auto-focus and flash that can capture detailed images and videos, as well as an 8MP front camera with fixed focus for selfies and video calls. Another good point is the audio, which has four Dolby Atmos-enhanced speakers and a smart microphone for a rich, immersive sound experience. The tablet's interface consists of a 3.5mm headphone jack for flexible audio and a Type-C port with PD2.0 for quick charging. The Lenovo K10 Pro boasts an array of sensors that serve multiple apps and improve user experience, including a vibration motor, gyroscope, Hall sensor, light sensor, and gravity sensor. The use of face recognition technology increases convenience and security. With Rhine TUV worldwide eye protection certification, the Lenovo tablet also places a high priority on eye comfort. This device is powered by a large, long-lasting 7700 mAh non-removable Li-Polymer battery. The Lenovo K10 Pro Tablet is a great option for both work and play because it strikes a balance between portability and a large display size with dimensions of 251.2 x 158.8 x 7.45mm.

Stunning and Smooth Tablet with Android 12L

The Lenovo Tab P11 Gen 2 Android tablet offers a range of features and functions with the Android 12L operating system, which is upgradable to Android 14 to enhance your productivity and enjoyment. The Lenovo Tab P11 Gen 2 tablet has 4GB of memory and up to 128GB of storage, which allows you to multitask and store your files and apps with ease. The Lenovo Tab P11 tablet also has a headphone/mic combo jack, a microSD slot, and a SIM card slot (for LTE models).

A Tablet that Offers Performance, Beauty, and Versatility
